fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Policy Claims Data Workflow


1. Data Ingestion  

  - Read Policy and Claims data.  

  - Join to create a Policy Claims dataset.


2. Date Conversion  

  - Convert string-formatted date values to date datatype.


3. Feature Extraction  

  - Extract week, month, and day from Claim Date.  

  - Create additional features:  

   - Monthly_Avg_Claim_Amount  

   - Status_Monthly_Avg_Claim_Amount  

   - Policy_Start_Claim_Date_Diff


4. Fraud Detection  

  - Apply business rule of fraud checking. Rule for fraud being if `Policy_Start_Claim_Date_Diff <= 60` AND `Monthly_Avg_Claim_Amount < 1000.0`.


5. Data Storage  

  - Save the processed data to Snowflake.
fields.title: Comment
